content: this pattern is for a square baby blanket in garter stitch with an eyelet edging that s it simple in design it shows off those special yarns perfectly this pattern would be perfect for just-no-longer-beginners who want to pick up a pattern with the beginnings of lace **yarn** any dk weight yarn sample shown knitted using approximately 200g 450yds of dk weight superfine alpaca yarn 70% alpaca/30% bfl from uk alpacas colour way used is parchment **needles & notions** 5 00mm circulars are probably going to be easier as you end up knitting across the diagonal of the blanket tapestry needle for weaving in the ends **gauge/gauge** 12sts x 22 row 11 garter ridges in 10cm/4 on 5mm needles **size chart** depends on how much yarn you plan on using the sample shown at the gauge given measures 69cm 27 ¼ square **techniques required** * casting on * knitting * decreasing k3tog * yarn overs * binding off **abbreviations used** k - knit k3tog - knit 3 together yo - yarn over co - cast on bobble - bind off
